channel.title: Arios 498 - Reliving the Good Times
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EHK4QvHcCOo
Play now at [url=http://ariosrsps.com/game/]Arios - RuneScape Private Server[/url]
[img]http://i.cubeupload.com/C8PmqL.png[/img]
[spoiler="Extra info"] Arios 498 aims to emulate the best period of time for RS, hence a 2008 based remake has been created for the sole purpose of your enjoyment. Unlike other servers, everything from the base to the 1000+ plug-ins that make up the server content has been made from scratch. Each piece of content that has been added has one sole purpose. To be flawless. The hundreds of hours spent developing Arios has produced content that has focused on being completely functional; without using any cheap tricks or shortcuts, while still being made efficiently - the result? Quite possibly one of the most developed remakes, with no consequences to server performance. Now you can relive your favourite RS memories without reliving the lag.
The server utilizes NIO for networking, as well as an innovative plug-in based developement system for action content, such as button actions, object actions, NPC actions and more.
The server content includes but is not limited to the following:
- From Imp Catcher to Dragon Slayer, enjoy all free to play quests fully remade.
- Over 350 music zones to bring back the best memories.
- Try your luck at God Wars, or if that doesn't tickle your fancy, perhaps the King Black Dragon can interested you? No? Maybe the Kalphite Queen or metal dragons are more your style.
- Want to test yourself as the best player killing machine this virtual world has witnessed? Both the wilderness and bounty hunter have been implemented and are ready for your murderous ways. To be the best, you need to take out the best, and there is no better way than using the bounty hunter highscores.
- Exchange your goods on the grandest of scales using the Grand Exchange, which has been remade to emulate the original with as much detail as possible. As a result, prices are influenced based on trades, while the statistical data from the Grand Exchange will also be shown on the website in the future, allowing merchanting to shine in all its glory.
- Find yourself starting out just the way you did back in 2008 with a fully made Tutorial Island.
- Should you happen to be bored (Which is an unimaginable concept in Arios) or want to challenge yourself and obtain unique items, you have a variety of minigames that have been fully remade for you to enjoy. These include Clan Wars, Pest Control, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Tzhaar Fight Pits and many more to come in future updates.
- Other various content includes the Falador Drop Party Room, gravestones, random events, different travelling methods (ships, gliders, canoe, etc) and several member quests; with more coming soon.
What are you waiting for? Come play Arios now and make your glorious past become your present.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Uqg2kC4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vYw8NJu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kkXjYoi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eABqMu4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1cKhzWn.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4dBuE.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4KwaF.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4KwvB.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5IZyz.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hDVp3Zi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/y6GSp9O.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4MahE.jpg[/img] [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/9425/63647449.jpg[/img] [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/7642/38945940.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/22wB3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/57ixK.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5fRkD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xVyZDaq.jpg[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: Arios 498 - Reliving the Good Times
item.dc:creator: @prothieum prothieum
item.description:
@prothieum wrote:

Hi,

After high demand I have added the ability to create holy, unholy and balanced prayer books.

You can do this by speaking to Jossik at the lighthouse near Rellekka.

I have also added a clue scroll count which tells you the amount of clue scrolls you have completed.
When a player receives rare item drops such as berserker rings, and godwars items there will be a world wide message displaying what they have received. You can toggle this ::togglenews
I have fixed a few problems with Revenants.
Some clue scroll rates have been fixed for certain npc.
And as always, tons of bug fixes which you can view in the bug history!
Media:




Read full topic

item.title: Arios 498 - Reliving the Good Times
item.dc:creator: @mit03 mit03
item.description:
@mit03 wrote:

As the Wilderness wasn’t nearly as dangerous as it should be, we have added Revenants.
Revenants are ghosts of beasts slain during the God Wars and are capable of using freezing attacks, teleblocks and even heal in combat.
They wander the wilderness in search for war, but are limited to the wilderness level system just like players.

To make up for the risky battle, they have a droptable worthy of your time (No, they do not drop PvP armour or corrupted armour).

In other news…

  • Team capes have been added.
  • Clan chat and the Private messaging system has been reworked.
  • 3 new perks were added to the shop:

Powerpoint <
This perk allows you to gain double the points in minigames such as Pest Control, Wizard Training Arena, Fight caves, Fight pits, …

Charm Collector <
This perks automatically adds charm drops to your inventory.

Clean Slate <
Lower the level of a skill of your choice, this is useful for pures and skillers who accidently trained a skill they didn’t want (this also works for resetting hitpoints to 1 instead of 10, for the die-hard skillers out there).

Thanks,
Arios development team

Read full topic

item.title: Arios 498 - Reliving the Good Times
item.dc:creator: @prothieum prothieum
item.description:
@prothieum wrote:

ox random xi:

Any of the players from day 1 still there?

Yep.

Hi,

As many of you know me & Emperor have been busy during the last two weeks working on a wide array of content. Due to the long wait and not having our PVP world ready yet I have decided to push this batch of bug fixes & updates to satisfy the Arios crowd.

The dwarf cannon quest has been added, you can now smith cannon balls and use multi cannons.
The dwarf multi cannon has been added and is fully functional.
Magic Training Arena: Truly one of my favourite updates so far, this unique piece of content has been requested numerous times by users and I have finally decided to add it. This mini game opens up the use of Bones to Peaches spell, infinity clothing and much more.
Helm of Neitiznot: Travel from Rellekka in order to purchase your brand new Helm of Neitiznot,you can purchase it for 50,000 GP.
Yaks and other NPCS have been added to the Neitiznot island.
A much larger stock of Spirit Shards have been added to satisfy our summoners.
Rock crabs were fixed, (once again…)
Added Yrsas Accoutrements shop.
Plenty of bug fixes have been made to give you the best experience possible.
Media:

















Kind regards,

Arios Development team.

Read full topic

item.title: Arios 498 - Reliving the Good Times
item.dc:creator: @prothieum prothieum
item.description:
@prothieum wrote:

Added the Mage Training Arena mini game!

Summary: [URL=http://“http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Mage_Training_Arena”]http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Mage_Training_Arena[/URL]

This mini game encompasses four different aspects of magic. Alchemy, Telekinesis, Enchanting and bone converting.

This mini game uses a currency called pizazz points, each game type has their own identification for these points. You can use these points to purchase equipment, runes and a new spell from a shop on the second level of the arena.

Media:












Read full topic
